arts.ttl: Barcelona Wears White Shorts for 125th Anniversary
arts.sum: In a departure from its usual match-day look, FC Barcelona took to the field against UD Las Palmas wearing its iconic blue and garnet shirt paired with white shorts.

arts.ttl: 11 vs 0 – Barcelona’s alarming record with & without Lamine Yamal this season
arts.sum: Barcelona’s concerning dependence on young winger Lamine Yamal has today been reiterated by the stats. This of course comes fresh off another altogether disappointing afternoon’s work for Barca earlier today.…

arts.ttl: Zeros all round: One Barcelona star’s disappointing display vs Las Palmas summed up by stats
arts.sum: The concerning statistics behind the performance put forth by Barcelona star Fermín López on Saturday have come to the fore online. Barcelona were of course back in action earlier today,…

arts.ttl: Time for Flick to have a slice of humble pie after another Barca loss
arts.sum: We know how much the team needs Lamine Yamal and Raphinha on the forward line. Lamine Yamal did come on at half-time, when the score was still 0-0, but he looked over eager, along with his fellow attacking players.

arts.ttl: Referee explains why he didn’t award Barca penalty for Cubarsi clash
arts.sum: Television cameras have now captured what referee Adrián Cordero Vega told the players on the pitch after deciding not to award a penalty. The Catalan giants felt they should have been awarded a spot-kick after Pau Cubarsi tangled with Mika Marmol.

arts.ttl: Referee explains why Barcelona were not awarded penalty vs Las Palmas
arts.sum: An insight into the reasoning behind Barcelona not being awarded a late penalty in the club’s meeting with Las Palmas earlier today has been provided. Hansi Flick’s troops were of…

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick explains Dani Olmo’s absence for Barcelona vs Las Palmas
arts.sum: Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick has provided an explanation for the lack of minutes afforded to Dani Olmo in the club’s latest outing. Barcelona were of course back in action…

arts.ttl: ‘Why wouldn’t you call that?’ – Barcelona star fumes over non-penalty call vs Las Palmas
arts.sum: Barcelona star Fermín López has made clear his frustration with the officiating in the club’s latest outing. This comes after Barcelona were denied what could have proven a pivotal spot-kick…

arts.ttl: ‘It’s the whole team’ - Flick left ‘very disappointed’ by Barca
arts.sum: The Catalans suffered their third league defeat of the season at Montjuic and now haven’t won in La Liga since the start of November against Espanyol. Now we don’t create as many chances or score as many goals.

arts.ttl: Barcelona suffer worrying injury blow as defender 'vomits blood' against Las Palmas
arts.sum: Barcelona suffered another injury blow during their La Liga match against Las Palmas when Alejandro Balde was stretchered off after sustaining a concerning injury.
